Change specific.name: Change specific
Change specific.description: The purpose of the change specific is to ensure all changes are assessed, approved implemented and reviewed in a controlled manner.

Configuration specific.name: Configuration specific
Configuration specific.description: The purpose of the configuration management process is to establish and maintain the integrity of al identified service components.

Release and deployment specific.name: Release and deployment specific
Release and deployment specific.description: The purpose of the release and deployment management process is to deploy releases into the liv environment in a controlled manner.

Service design specific.name: Service design specific
Service design specific.description: The purpose of the service design process is to design and develop new or changed services.
